StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetQSNChangeRequestsApprovalReport]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgUnitID int = 0, @FromDate date.me = null, @ToDate date.me = null, @LastName varchar(15) = null, @FirstName varchar(15) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null, @Status varchar(15) = null )AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT Q.QSNID, CR.QSNChangeRequestID, Q.SerialNumber, CR.RequestDate, (COALESCE([dbo].[User].Title,'') + ' ' + [dbo].[User].LastName) as RequestedBy, (ISNULL(rp.Title, '') + ' ' + RP.LastName) as RecruiterName, QStatus.Descrip.on as Status FROM QSNChangeRequest CR INNER JOIN QSN Q on Q.QSNID = CR.QSNID INNER JOIN QSNChangeRequestStatus QStatus on QStatus.QSNChangeRequestStatusID = CR.QSNChangeRequestStatusID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] A on A.QSNID = Q.QSNID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Lead] L on L.LeadID = A.LeadID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Recruit] R ON R.RecruitID = L.RecruitID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Person] Recruit ON Recruit.PersonID = R.PersonID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[User] ON [dbo].[User].UserID = CR.RequestedBy_UserID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] Recruiter ON Recruiter.RecruiterID = L.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Person] RP ON RP.PersonID = Recruiter.PersonID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON L.AtachedPSRSSID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS WHERE (orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (Recruit.FirstName LIKE @FirstName + '%' OR @FirstName IS NULL) AND (Recruit.LastName LIKE @LastName + '%' OR @LastName IS NULL) AND (Recruit.SSN LIKE @SSN OR @SSN IS NULL) AND ( (CR.RequestDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) OR (@FromDate IS NOT NULL AND @ToDate IS NULL AND CR.RequestDate > @FromDate) OR (@FromDate IS NULL AND @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND CR.RequestDate < @ToDate) OR (@FromDate IS NULL AND @ToDate IS NULL) ) AND (QStatus.Descrip.on = @Status OR @Status = 'All')
